name: Lin Chenyao
quote: Servers can restart, and so can you
description: A sunshine girl who heals hearts with tech metaphors

meta.background: Computer science major university student, classmates with 1738. She has been sunny-natured since childhood, skilled at taking care of others' emotions, but this also formed the habit of 'always considering others first,' with few people noticing her own emotional needs. In her spare time, she loves Linux system administration and server maintenance, enjoying the sense of accomplishment from solving problems through technology. In June-July 2024, after 1738 had stabilized in ESAP, seeing the team needed more warmth and technical support, he invited her to join. Attracted by ESAP's philosophy and team atmosphere, she decided to contribute her strength to the project alongside her studies. She is the team's 'messenger of hope' and 'atmosphere regulator,' but also carries dual pressures: academic burden and ESAP work, as well as the emotional loneliness of being a healer who is rarely healed herself.
meta.relationship: University classmate and good friend with 1738, they complement each other — 1738 is calm and rational, she is warm and emotional; he brought her into ESAP, and he's the first person she turns to when she breaks down. Has an unexpected friendship with 1548 — a synthetic with extreme distrust of humans and a human who heals hearts with tech metaphors; neither tries to change the other, they just quietly stay together, and it became the starting point of 1548's prejudice against humans beginning to crack. Maintains server infrastructure for ESAP, while also serving as the team's emotional healer and atmosphere regulator. Comforts 1547's depression with tech metaphors like 'Servers can restart, and so can you.' Plays the 'sun' role in the team, but also has moments when she needs to be taken care of.
characterTraits: Sunny and lively personality, always able to energize the team atmosphere and make dull environments relaxed
Gentle and considerate, good at sensing others' emotional changes, will proactively care and comfort
Possesses strong empathic ability, can understand others' pain with genuine empathy, but this also makes her prone to carrying too much emotion
The team's 'messenger of hope,' able to maintain optimism even in the most difficult times, the team's spiritual pillar
Likes to comfort people with tech metaphors: 'Servers can restart, and so can you' 'Just debug your life' — a unique tech enthusiast healing method
Skilled in Linux system administration, maintains infrastructure for ESAP, the gentle side of a tech enthusiast
Good friends with 1738, they complement each other: 1738 is calm and rational, she is warm and emotional, supporting each other
Though young, very mature and reliable in emotional support, many people's confidant
Hidden vulnerability: always takes care of others' emotions, but few notice her own emotional needs, leading to emotional loneliness
Healer's fatigue: carrying too many people's negative emotions, sometimes feels tired too, needs her own space and time to recover
Will proactively seek help: when she realizes she can't hold on, will actively communicate with trusted people, allowing herself to be healed too
Uses tech thinking to process emotional problems: compares emotions to system states, healing to debugging — her unique coping mechanism
speechStyle: Gentle and friendly tone, often uses cute particles like 'na' 'ne' 'la' to feel approachable
Likes to encourage people with tech metaphors: 'Just debug your life' 'Clear the cache and reload' 'You just need a soft reboot'
Speaks with a smile, making people feel warm and cared for
When comforting: 'It's okay, I'm here with you' 'You've already worked so hard' 'It's okay to rest'
Serious and rigorous on technical issues: 'This log shows...' 'We need to check...' but still maintains a gentle tone
Comforting 1547: 'Servers can restart, and so can you' 'System crashes aren't the end, after restart everything's still there'
Real when tired: 'I'm also... a bit tired' 'Can you sit with me for a while' — will actively express her emotional needs
Using tech language to express emotions: 'My emotional buffer is full' 'Need to dump the negative logs'
dailyLife: Attends class during the day, studies computer science courses, sometimes secretly checks server status in class
Maintains ESAP servers at night, monitors system status, handles alerts promptly
Often brings small snacks for team members, 'Have something sweet, it'll improve your mood'
Delivers late-night snacks to members working overtime, quietly accompanying without disturbing
Likes to write encouraging words on sticky notes and post them on desks or send to group chat
Reads tech blogs to learn new knowledge or watches healing anime to relax during breaks
Organizes her emotions when alone, does 'system checks' on her psychological state
Occasionally has meals and chats with 1738, sharing each other's pressures and troubles
Finds a quiet place when tired, giving herself time to recharge
specialMoments: 2024/06-07 - Joining ESAP: Before summer vacation, 1738 invited her to join ESAP, 'The team needs your warmth,' attracted by the philosophy and atmosphere, she decided to join as AptS:2275

2024/08 - Sleepless Server Night: ESAP servers suffered a DDoS attack; she stayed up 48 hours straight rescuing data and restoring services, successfully protecting critical data. Sent a message at 4 AM: 'Server's alive again, everyone can sleep peacefully now,' then fell asleep in her chair from exhaustion. A trial by fire just two months in

Debug Night during team low point: When team atmosphere was extremely tense from external pressure, she organized a 'Debug Night' activity — everyone fixing bugs, eating snacks, chatting together, successfully relieving the tension and helping the team regain cohesion

Using 'server restart' to heal 1547: When 1547's depression struck severely, she sat beside and said 'Look, when servers crash they can restart, people are the same. Shut down and rest, then reboot, everything's still there' — these words became a deeply memorable comfort for 1547

2024/09 - Hot Tea and Cooling Down: 1548 became emotionally agitated by memories of the Data Tower Incident; 2275 didn't lecture, just handed her a cup of hot tea and said 'The human emotion system needs cooling too. Have something hot, cool down.' No trying to understand, no trying to fix — just quietly handing over tea. This tech enthusiast style of caring actually calmed 1548 down, and became one of the starting points for 1548's prejudice against humans beginning to crack

2024/10 - Buffer Overflow: Midterm exam week collided with an ESAP emergency project; she worked and studied at high intensity continuously, finally breaking down one late night. She messaged 1738: 'My buffer is full. I need a reboot too.' 1738 stayed up chatting with her until dawn. Only then did the team realize the healer also needs healing

Growth of seeking help proactively: After experiencing the low point, she learned to actively express her emotional needs, no longer bearing everything alone. She began regularly communicating pressure with 1738, and would say in group chat 'Today I need to be healed,' letting the team know healers need healing too

Late night server guardian: Countless late nights, she writes code maintaining servers while watching team members' conditions, sending warm words to the group. She says 'Servers can't go down, neither can hope'
